trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to an activity status event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um local qualificado de atividade que corresponde a um evento de status de atividade no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Whenever the execution status of an activity changes, the workflow instance emits an activity status event to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que altera o status de execução de uma atividade, a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de status de atividade para a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can send the tracking service an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> whenever an activity status event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução pode enviar o serviço de controle de um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> sempre que ocorre um evento de status de atividade.

trans-unit.source: Usually, a tracking service is not interested in every activity status event that occurs in the workflow instance, but only in activity status events associated with certain kinds of activities at specified locations in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um serviço de controle não está interessado em todos os eventos de status de atividade que ocorre na instância de fluxo de trabalho, mas apenas em eventos de status de atividade associado a determinados tipos de atividades em locais especificados na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying a reference activity type, a set of activity status change events, and a set of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> define os parâmetros correspondentes para tal um local, especificando um tipo de atividade de referência, um conjunto de eventos de alteração de status de atividade e um conjunto de condições que mais precisamente pode qualificar uma instância ou instâncias do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um único <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> podem se referir a mais de um local real no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> in order to define the match parameters for an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> para definir os parâmetros de correspondência para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the reference activity type to be matched by setting either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o tipo de atividade de referência a ser correspondido, definindo o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> to specify interest in activities derived from the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedTypes%2A> para especificar o interesse em atividades derivado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> to specify the activity status events to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> valores <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> para especificar os eventos de status de atividade a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to specify interest in the reference activity type only for specific conditions.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> para especificar o interesse no tipo de atividade de referência somente para condições específicas.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify interest in only a particular named instance of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode especificar interesse em apenas uma instância nomeada específica do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" />.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor and you do not explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code, then if a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> is later used on your tracking profile an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar o construtor padrão e você não definir explicitamente o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> em seu código, se, em seguida, um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfileSerializer> será usado posteriormente no seu perfil de rastreamento, uma exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.target: `false`.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of an activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo CLR (Common Language Runtime) de uma atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class by using the specified activity name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> usando o nome da atividade especificado.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividade é "CodeActivity".

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> is set to `activityTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> é definido como `activityTypeName`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation" /> class that has a reference activity type with the specified unqualified name, that specifies whether to match activities derived from the reference activity type, and that matches the specified activity execution status events.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: For example, the unqualified name of the CLR type of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is"CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o nome não qualificado do tipo CLR de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividade é "CodeActivity".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the reference activity to be matched.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the reference activity type in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser especificar o tipo de atividade de referência de maneira independente de versão, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the reference activity type for the location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência para o local.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: O nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o nome não qualificado do tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "CodeActivity".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para especificar o nome não qualificado de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> o conjunto de atividades <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> para "CodeActivity".

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> provides a much easier way to specify a reference activity type when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> Fornece uma maneira muito mais fácil de especificar um tipo de atividade de referência quando você cria um perfil diretamente no XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> also provides a version-independent way of referring to a reference activity type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> também fornece uma maneira independente de versão de se referir a um tipo de atividade de referência.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve especificar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de condições que são usadas para qualificar o interesse na atividade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection" /> that contains conditions that are used to qualify interest in the activity.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection" /> que contém condições que são usadas para qualificar interesse na atividade.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more precisely define the instance of the reference activity type to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> para definir com mais precisão a instância do tipo de atividade de referência a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to"CodeActivity" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> that specifies that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você deseja corresponder somente <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> atividades com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> igual a "MyCode", você pode definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> para "CodeActivity" e adicione um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> que especifica que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de instância de atividade deve ser igual a "MyCode".

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be `true` and one of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> must be matched for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> devem ser `true` e uma da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> valores em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> devem ser iguais para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of activity status events that can be matched for this location.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista de eventos de status de atividade que podem ser correspondidos para esse local.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> that contains one or more of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> que contém um ou mais do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> specifies the activity status events for which the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> can be matched.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> Especifica os eventos de status de atividade para o qual o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> pode ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> values in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> must be matched and every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> must be `true` for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus> valores em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.ExecutionStatusEvents%2A> devem ser correspondentes e cada <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> deve ser `true` para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation> a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: An empty list specifies that no events are to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista vazia não especifica que nenhum evento a ser correspondido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether activities derived from the reference activity type should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as atividades derivadas do tipo de atividade de referência devem ser correspondidas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if activities derived from the reference activity type of the location should be matched; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se atividades derivam do tipo de atividade de referência do local deve ser correspondido; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.
